properties.Description: Describes properties of a connector setting

hybridComputeProvisioningState.Description: State of the service principal and its secret.

autoProvision.Description: Whether or not to automatically install Azure Arc (hybrid compute) agents on machines.

resourceGroupName.Description: The name of the resource group where Arc (Hybrid Compute) connectors are connected.

region.Description: The location where the metadata of machines will be stored

proxyServer.Description: For a non-Azure machine that is not connected directly to the internet, specify a proxy server that the non-Azure machine can use.

secret.Description: A secret string that the application uses to prove its identity, also can be referred to as application password (write only).

grantedPermissions.Description: The permissions detected in the cloud account.

accountId.Description: The ID of the cloud account

awsAccessKeyId.Description: Public key element of the AWS credential object (write only)

awsSecretAccessKey.Description: Secret key element of the AWS credential object (write only)

authenticationType.Description: AWS cloud account connector based credentials, the credentials is composed of access key ID and secret key, for more details, refer to Creating an IAM User in Your AWS Account (write only)

accountId.Description: The ID of the cloud account

awsAssumeRoleArn.Description: Assumed role ID is an identifier that you can use to create temporary security credentials.

awsExternalId.Description: A unique identifier that is required when you assume a role in another account.

authenticationType.Description: AWS cloud account connector based assume role, the role enables delegating access to your AWS resources. The role is composed of role Amazon Resource Name (ARN) and external ID. For more details, refer to Creating a Role to Delegate Permissions to an IAM User (write only)

organizationId.Description: The organization ID of the GCP cloud account

type.Description: Type field of the API key (write only)

projectId.Description: Project ID field of the API key (write only)

privateKeyId.Description: Private key ID field of the API key (write only)

privateKey.Description: Private key field of the API key (write only)

clientEmail.Description: Client email field of the API key (write only)

clientId.Description: Client ID field of the API key (write only)

authUri.Description: Auth URI field of the API key (write only)

tokenUri.Description: Token URI field of the API key (write only)

authProviderX509CertUrl.Description: Auth provider x509 certificate URL field of the API key (write only)

clientX509CertUrl.Description: Client x509 certificate URL field of the API key (write only)

authenticationType.Description: GCP cloud account connector based service to service credentials, the credentials are composed of the organization ID and a JSON API key (write only)
